page.title: 06ELVASTON PARK VISIT Ref.P.5
page.content: {Asterdale School's}day visit schedule: 9.45am. Arrive by coach.Met by ranger Mr.Dunn.Walk to {Study Centre} {observing}nesting boxes,badger gate,saplings and birdlife. 10.45am.{Talk}on 'minibeasts' in the Study Centre Classroom.Children grouped and allocated collecting apparatus,beating mats,pooters,hair brushes,collecting dishes and tubes. 11.00am.{Walk}through woodland finding separate tree locations for pupil groups.Shook the branches to dislodge creatures which fell onto beating mats.{Collected}creatures carefully. Returned to Study Centre classroom. 12.15pm.{Ate}packed lunches. 1.00pm. {Observed}creatures using magnifying lenses.{Drew}and coloured the'minibeasts.'{Identified}many from available specialist books. 3.15pm.Return to school.
